programme.title: Cure Bowl

Champions of the Mid-American Conference and Conference USA collide with interim coaches (OCs Rod Smith and Brian Smith) in charge after Tim Albin (to Charlotte) and Rich Rodriguez (to West Virginia) departed. Ohio is bidding for its sixth straight bowl victory, while the Gamecocks of "Jax State" are going for their second bowl win in just two years of FBS football.

programme.title: College Football Playoff First Round
programme.desc: Indiana (11-1) at Notre Dame (11-1) in a College Football Playoff first-round game. From Notre Dame Stadium. A Hoosier State showdown kicks off the first-ever 12-team CFP format, with first-year coach Curt Cignetti leading IU into South Bend for the first time since 1991, a season that ended with the Hoosiers most recent bowl win. QB Riley Leonard and RB Jeremiyah Love spearhead the Irish against a defense led by all-Big Ten lineman Mikail Kamara, LB Aiden Fisher and DB DAngelo Ponds.

programme.title: Gasparilla Bowl

programme.title: Bodies Bodies Bodies (2022)
programme.desc: As an intense tropical storm bears down on a remote family estate, a cohort of privileged, out-of-touch twenty-somethings plans to spare no expense for an explosive party. Yet, their evening of drunken merriment soon takes a sinister turn when an innocent game yields fatal consequences, all the while exposing the fake personalities that lie beneath the friends carefully curated exteriors.

programme.title: Scary Movie 2 (2001)
programme.desc: A demented professor leads a group of students to haunted-house scares by tricking them into thinking they are participating for a school project.

programme.title: Scary Movie 3 (2003)

programme.title: The Fabulous Four (2024)
programme.desc: Three lifelong female friends, a tight-knit group who have preserved their friendship for decades since their college years, embark on a trip to Florida with a specific reason to become bridesmaids. Never mind that they are all over sixty years of age. They are attending their college friends surprise wedding. However, as they spend time rekindling friendship moments and memories, other issues also emerge.

programme.title: Flashdance (1983)
programme.desc: A Pittsburgh steel-mill welder by day and an exotic dancer by night dreams of a ballet career.

programme.title: Dear Santa (2024)

programme.title: Shaft (2000)

Jackson stars as New York City cop John Shaft, who quits the force and decides to dispense his own brand of vigilante justice against a racist killer (Christian Bale) and a Dominican drug lord (Jeffrey Wright). Richard Roundtree, who played the original John Shaft in three 70s crime dramas, has a cameo as Jacksons uncle and namesake. Busta Rhymes, Vanessa Williams, Dan Hedaya.

programme.title: Confess, Fletch (2022)
programme.desc: Confess, Fletch is a reboot of the classic crime-comedy film. This time, Fletch becomes the main suspect in a series of murders while investigating thieves that stole his girlfriends art collection. To exonerate himself, Fletch begins his own investigation into the murders and discovers a lot of people could be the guilty party, including his art collecting girlfriend.

programme.desc: Three lifelong female friends, a tight-knit group who have preserved their friendship for decades since their college years, embark on a trip to Florida with a specific reason to become bridesmaids. However, as they spend time rekindling friendship moments and memories, other issues also emerge.

programme.desc: Lured from Victorian England to the wilds of the Congo, Tarzan (Alexander Skarsgrd) must return to the jungle to save his captive wife (Margot Robbie) from King Leopold's devious envoy (Christoph Waltz).

programme.title: X-Men Origins: Wolverine
programme.desc: Explores Wolverine's (Hugh Jackman) violent past, the death of his lover and his complex relationship with Victor Creed (Liev Schreiber).

programme.title: Pure
programme.desc: An insecure girl grapples with fears of embracing her sexuality.

programme.title: Spy Kids: All the Time in the World
programme.desc: Upon learning that their stepmother (Jessica Alba) is a retired spy, twins step up to help save the world from an evil maniac known as Timekeeper (Jeremy Piven).

programme.title: Spy Kids: All the Time in the World

programme.title: El Perro y el Gato

programme.desc: An energetic dog and a mellow cat teach vocabulary in English and Spanish.

programme.title: Class Divide
programme.desc: Filmmaker Marc Levin examines income inequality and gentrification in Chelsea, N.Y.

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Squeakquel
programme.desc: Now in the care of Dave Seville's nephew Toby (Zachary Levi), chipmunks Alvin, Simon and Theodore enter a battle of the bands contest to save their school's music program.

programme.title: Kareem: Minority of One
programme.desc: The life and career of the NBA's all-time leading scorer, Kareem Abdul-Jabbar.

programme.title: Belichick & Saban: The Art of Coaching

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: A magic portal transports the little blue people to Manhattan, where they must find a way back to their village before evil wizard Gargamel can find them.

programme.title: Wonka

programme.title: Gulliver's Travels

programme.title: The Martian

programme.title: Independence Day

programme.title: Black Adam

programme.title: Spy Kids
programme.desc: When a technical genius kidnaps retired spies (Antonio Banderas, Carla Gugino), only their children can save them.
